title: Kicking The Habit With 'Shrooms
description: Magic mushrooms — they're not just for getting weird with your friends. Researchers are increasingly looking at psychedelics to treat conditions such as depression and addiction.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Kicking The Habit With 'Shrooms
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: How could a magic mushroom trip help people beat addiction? We talk to a patient who used a chemical in 'shrooms to help her quit smoking.
itunes:subtitle: How could a magic mushroom trip help people beat addiction? We talk to a patient who used a chemical in 'shrooms to help her quit smoking.
content:encoded: Magic mushrooms — they're not just for getting weird with your friends. Researchers are increasingly looking at psychedelics to treat conditions such as depression and addiction.
